# cloudtemple_iam_tenants (Data Source)

To query this datasource you will need the `iam_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudtemple_iam_tenants" "example" {}

output "tenants" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_iam_tenants.example
}
```
